attributes.action: Launch a public enquiry into the way Amazon treats it's workers in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
We, the people of the United Kingdom call for a public inquiry into the way Amazon.com, Inc. treats it's UK workers in the wake of a BBC investigation revealing the immoral and inhumane conditions employees of amazon have to work under in their warehouses,
including, but not limited to:
Risk of dismissal for calling in sick;
Risk of Mental and Physical illness
